A bookshelf can be used as a desk organizer by placing office supplies and papers on its shelves.
A bookshelf can be used as a room divider by installing curtains or screens between its shelves.
A bookshelf can be used as a display case for collectibles or artwork by placing them on its shelves.
A bookshelf can be used as a makeshift storage unit for bicycles by hanging them on its shelves.
A bookshelf can be used as a bookshelf for pets by installing shelves for pet beds, toys, and food.
